tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ReviewAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id INT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(20),
    confidence_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES CustomerReviews(review_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_text VARCHAR(500),
    review_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_sentiments (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_name VARCHAR(50),
    sentiment_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE review_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id INT REFERENCES customer_reviews(review_id),
    sentiment_id INT REFERENCES customer_sentiments(sentiment_id),
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerReviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SentimentScores (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  positive_score FLOAT,
  negative_score FLOAT,
  sentiment_label VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  email_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ReviewTags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  review_id INT,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)
